title: Effect of Coal-Burning Power Plant on Lake

content.description: Scientists want to examine the effects of a coal-burning power plant on the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="sans-serif"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of a lake that is downwind of the power plant. They take samples from a lake that is not downwind of the power plant to serve as a control. However, they did not realize that the lake they chose as a control group was a geothermal hot spring with acidic water.
content.question: Which of the following best describes how their choice of control group could affect the results of their experiment?

choices.label: Using this control would not have an effect on the outcome because the high temperature of the hot spring reduces the acidity of the water in the lake.

The coal-burning power plant would appear to have a much larger effect on the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="sans-serif"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of the experimental group because the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="sans-serif"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> in the control lake would be elevated from the acidic water.

The coal-burning power plant would not appear to have a large impact because the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="sans-serif"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> levels of the two lakes would be similar.
The coal-burning power plant would affect both lakes because the Coriolis effect and weather patterns would circulate pollutants in the atmosphere.

content.answer: The coal-burning power plant would not appear to have a large impact because the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="sans-serif"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> levels of the two lakes would be similar.
